com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block
Class CreeperExplosion

java.lang.Object
  com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.CreeperExplosion

public class CreeperExplosion
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an explosion, with the list of blocks destroyed, the time of the explosion, and the radius.

Author:
nitnelave

checkReplace

public boolean checkReplace()
Check if the explosion has blocks to repair, and repair them (or one of them in case of block per block).

Returns:
False if the explosion has not started its replacements yet because it is not time.

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Get whether the list of blocks to be replaced is empty.

Returns:
Whether the list is empty.
